titleStmt.title: Greenes mourning garment giuen him by repentance at the funerals of loue, which he presentes for a fauour to all young gentlemen that wish to weane themselues from wanton desires. R. Greene. Vtriusq[ue] academia in artibus magister. Sero sed serio.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. W[olfe] for Thomas Newman,
